eu_initiatives: Competitividad de la industria, personas - capacitación, medio ambiente, tecnología, relaciones exteriores...
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: The AIC-Automotive Intelligence Center is a unique value-generation center for the automotive sector based on a concept of open innovation in which companies improve their competitiveness through cooperation. Using a market-oriented approach, AIC integrates knowledge, technology and industrial development under one umbrella.
